alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Lee (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 6:59AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lee, south central Crittenden, DeSoto, Tunica, Tate and northwestern Panola Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 659 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Robinsonville, or 13 miles southeast of Hughes, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southaven, Olive Branch, Horn Lake, Hernando, Senatobia, Coldwater, Como, Walls, Tunica, Crenshaw, Horseshoe Lake, Lake Cormorant, Strayhorn, Pleasant Grove, Eudora, Dubbs, North Tunica, Lewisburg, Arkabutla and Pinckney. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
